isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS FULLER RT-610 SERIES - INSTALL - TIMING OF COUNTERSHAFT ASSEMBLIES

step1.para: Place the left countershaft into mesh with the mainshaft gears, placing the marked timing tooth on the countershaft drive gear into proper mesh with the two marked timing teeth on the main drive gear ( Figure 159).

figure.caption: Figure 159. Place Left Countershaft into Mesh With Mainshaft Gears

step1.para: Hold the left countershaft in position and install the front and rear bearings.

step2.para: Center the rear of the left countershaft in the rear bore of the case with a wood block.
Partially install the front bearing on the countershaft and in the case bore ( Figure 160).
Partially install the rear bearing on the countershaft and in the case bore ( Figure 161).
Use flanged bearing driver to complete seating both front and rear bearings ( Figure 162).

figure.caption: Figure 160. Partially Install Front Bearing on Countershaft
Figure 161. Partially Install Rear Bearing on Countershaft
Figure 162. Use Flanged Bearing Driver to Complete Seating Both Front and Rear Bearings

step1.para: Install snap ring in the groove in the rear bore of the case ( Figure 163).

figure.caption: Figure 163. Install Snap Ring in Groove in Rear Bore of Case

step1.para: Place the right countershaft into mesh with the mainshaft gears, placing the marked timing tooth on the countershaft drive gear into proper mesh with the two marked timing teeth on the main drive gear ( Figure 164).

figure.caption: Figure 164. Place Right Countershaft into Mesh With Mainshaft Gears

step1.para: Hold the right countershaft in position and install the front and rear bearings in the same manner as installed on the left countershaft ( Figure 165).

figure.caption: Figure 165. Install Front and Rear Bearings

step1.para: Install the snap ring in the groove in the rear bore of the case.
